Text.Text: Hmmm...?
Of course you can... fire away.
Certainly.  What's on your mind?
ABSOLUTELY NOT!  He, he, he - just making a funny.  Sure, what would you like to know?
*Phew!*  I tell you B-W, I was done for sure - my chants almost spent, and if I hadn't put that blasted worm to sleep, I-.  Ohhh, pardon me.  Why, HELLO THERE.
Zack's the name... Zack Boosenburry... cleric/illusionist of Baervan Wildwanderer.  Have you-excuse me for a moment.  Aocha?  *Aocha?*  AOCHA?!
Wasn't sure what I was kicking, but that worm sure let out a good belch or two - just enough for me to toss that note out.  Ummm... happen to see a spider around here?
I was meditating on my notes and didn't hear it approach.  The next thing I knew I was inside its belly in one, disgusting gulp - been in there for... days!
Aocha - my mount - was lost when that worm so rudely assaulted me.  She's a huge spider, but I've tamed and trained her well - gentle as a mouse she is.
I'd be grateful if you could help me find my Aocha first - I'm sure she's around here somewhere.  Do that for me and I'll gladly help you with whatever I can.
Of course you did - my apologies.  Aocha has been with me for a long time, that's all.  I owe you my life, so how can I help?

A temple of ice has been constructed here, and I'm investigating it for personal reasons.  I need to learn as many details about it as possible, so I'd welcome any information you could share with me.
Aocha - come here girl!  *PHHIRRR!*  Oh, I almost forgot - fumbling around inside that worm I hit upon a few items.  Farewell.
Aocha... AOCHA...!  A good mount she was...  Perhaps her death was inevitable, <CHARNAME> - being who... *what* she was.  In any case, thank you for telling me.
[no text]
Oh, there you are, <CHARNAME>!  Speak to your friend - he should be awake now.  Well - back to the glacier for me.  Farewell.
Yes - tell me where it is and I'll meet you there.  The ritual will take a moment, but I'll be successful as long as I'm not interrupted.
You didn't doubt me... did you?  That will teach Auril *never* to interfere a follower of the great Baervan Wildwanderer!
No, I was *rudely* interrupted.  I'll have to begin the entire process over again!
I can make no promises, but I'll try my best, B-W willing.
I haven't used that plant in over a century, though given enough time I'm sure I can still find it.  Where would you like me to look?
Why, yes, indeed I do.  In fact, I kept some inside one of my component pouches - let me see... oh, yes, here it is!  Take it - it's the least I can do for your help.
No, I'm still looking.  That plant can be *quite* elusive, especially with such a bloodthirsty chill in the air!
Hurrah!  These are excellent details!  I *knew* I could count on you, <CHARNAME>.
Have you found her?!  Have you found my Aocha?
Oh, <CHARNAME>, you startled me!  Are you ready to share your information about the ice temple with me?
Why, hello again <CHARNAME>!
I'll go this way - we might cover more ground if we split up.  Give me a holler if you see her.  Wind speed, my friend!
Any information you can find out about the temple will be helpful in my investigation - the more the better.  Pleasant journeys!
Farewell, <CHARNAME>!  May Baervan Wildwanderer, or whatever gods you believe in, watch over you.
Yes, yes, of course.  I don't have too many supplies left, but perhaps you'll find something to your liking.
Thank you B-W!  Thank you equally, <CHARNAME>!  Where?  Where's my Aocha?!
Really?!  Let me grab my - all right, got it!  Whenever you're ready, <CHARNAME> - I'll take notes while you're speaking.
Consider it done!  It'll take at least an hour, so give me time to find it and check back with me later.  Farewell!
Consider it done!  It'll take at least an hour, so give me time to find it and meet me there later.  Farewell!

Although... Auril usually gives me much more of a fight when I take an altar from her, but this one was easy - too easy.  In fact, I sensed *very* little power coming from it, so perhaps we're driving her away for good!
No, it was trained to attack.  I didn't even hear its master give the command.
Yes.  I can teach you how if you'd like?

A remorhaz can't be trained if it's unhappy, hungry, tired, or already has a master.  Young worms are easiest to train, but veterans who've lost their masters will quickly relearn their task if commanded to do so.

If you tell them to eat when hungry, sleep when tired, and avoid issuing commands too quickly, they should remain happy.  If they seem to anger for no reason, you're probably flooding their cranium with commands, so back away slowly.
If you encourage any tasks they obey with positive feedback, and reprimand any bad behavior with a dominant voice, they should be trained within three orders.
I'm investigating the temple of ice that's been constructed here.  I appreciate the valuable information you've given me about it.
We've been trying to enter the ice temple's side door, but it won't budge.  Could you squeeze through its opening for us?
Do you have any belladonna?
How'd you get inside that remorhaz?
Who's Aocha?
What was the reason why you're here?
What was the reason why you're here?
What are you doing here?
Actually, I must take my leave.  Farewell.
Hello.  I'm <CHARNAME>.
Hello.  I'm <CHARNAME>.
Well met.  I'm <CHARNAME>.
Well met.  I'm <CHARNAME>.
If you're Zack, then this must be your note.
Aocha?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
You're a cleric and an illusionist?  Does that mean you have spells?
You're a cleric and an illusionist?  Does that mean you have spells?
Well met.  Farewell.
Well met.  Farewell.
Spider?
What was the reason why you're here?

I must take my leave.  Farewell.
I must take my leave.  Farewell.
So it attacked you for no reason?
Notes?
Notes?
Notes?
I see.  Farewell.
I see.  Farewell.
We've found her.
We'll help you find your mount.  Farewell for now.
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
I see.  Farewell.
I see.  Farewell.
We've already found her.
We'll help you find your mount.  Farewell for now.
Your Aocha?
Well, we did save your life.  Doesn't that count for something?
Well, we did save your life.  Doesn't that count for something?
You don't seem very grateful for a person whose life we just saved.  If it weren't for us you might've been coming out of that worm's back end right now.
You don't seem very grateful for a person whose life we just saved.  If it weren't for us you might've been coming out of that worm's back end right now.
You don't seem very grateful for a person whose life we just saved.  If it weren't for us you might've been coming out of that worm's back end right now.
Listen, gnome, we just saved your life, so stop crying about some foolish spider and help us figure out what's going on here!
Listen, gnome, we just saved your life, so stop crying about some foolish spider and help us figure out what's going on here!
Listen, gnome, we just saved your life, so stop crying about some foolish spider and help us figure out what's going on here!
Let me think about it.  Farewell.
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
I'd like to take a look at your spells.
Nothing right now.  Farewell.
We're ready to tell you what we know.
Yes we'll tell you what we know.
All right, we'll let you know what we know when we know it.  Until then.
All right, we'll let you know what we know when we know it.  Until then.
I must take my leave.  Farewell.
I must take my leave.  Farewell.
Farewell.
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
Can I ask you a question?
If you're feeling up to it, I'd like to take a look at your spells.
I must take my leave now.  Farewell.
[no text]
[no text]
Thank you.  Farewell.
It's located at the far end of the chapel on the first floor of the ice temple.
It's located at the far end of the chapel on the first floor of the ice temple.
It's located in a secret room on the second floor of the ice temple.
It's located in a secret room on the second floor of the ice temple.
On second thought, never mind.
On second thought, never mind.
Thank you.  Farewell.
Thank you.  Farewell.
Please try again.  Farewell.
Please try again.  Farewell.
Never mind then.  Farewell.
Never mind then.  Farewell.
All right.
On second thought, never mind.
Please look within the foothills.
Please look within the foothills.
Please look around the glacier.
Please look around the glacier.
Please look on the first floor of the ice temple.
Please look on the first floor of the ice temple.
Please look on the second floor of the ice temple.
Please look on the second floor of the ice temple.

Thank you.  Farewell.
Please keep looking.  Farewell.
Please look within the foothills instead.  Farewell.
Please look around the glacier instead.  Farewell.
Please look on the first floor of the ice temple instead.  Farewell.

Yes.

Not yet, but I'd like to take a look at your spells.
No, I'm still looking.  Farewell.
Yes.

No, stay here.  We'll let you know when we've found her.  Farewell.

I understand.

Actually, can I ask you a question instead?
Actually, can I ask you a question instead?
Actually, can I ask you a question instead?
Actually, can I ask you a question instead?
I've changed my mind.  Farewell.
She's in the northwest portion of this glacier.
She's in the northwest portion of this glacier.
I've bad news.  She was dead by the time we found her.
I've bad news.  She was dead by the time we found her.
I've bad news.  We didn't realize she was your mount, and we accidentally killed her.
Parts of your precious Aocha are still dripping from our weapons.  And now we'll see if we can make you squeal even louder, little man-child!
No, I misspoke.  Farewell.
We've learned some information about the temple...
We've learned some information about the temple...
We've learned a good amount of information about the temple...
We've learned a large amount of information about the temple...
We've learned an exceptional amount of information about the temple...
Can I ask you a question first?
Can I ask you a question first?
Can I ask you a question first?
Can I ask you a question first?

Actually, we'd like to investigate more.  Farewell.

You mentioned notes?

I see.  Farewell.
Yes.
